<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="background-color: white; background-position: initial initial; background-repeat: initial initial;"><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;
mso-hansi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
color:#3E3E3E;mso-font-kerning:0pt">面试的时候经常会被问到</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:#3E3E3E;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> malloc </span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#3E3E3E;
mso-font-kerning:0pt">的实现。从操作系统层面来说，</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:
18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
color:#3E3E3E;mso-font-kerning:0pt">malloc </span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;
font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";mso-fareast-font-family:
宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#3E3E3E;mso-font-kerning:0pt">确实是考察面试者对操作系统底层的存储管理理解的一个很好的方式，涉及到虚拟内存、分页</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#3E3E3E;mso-font-kerning:0pt">/</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#3E3E3E;
mso-font-kerning:0pt">分段等。下面逐个细说。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;
font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
color:#3E3E3E;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="background-color: white; background-position: initial initial; background-repeat: initial initial;"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#3E3E3E;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><o:p> </o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="background-color: white; background-position: initial initial; background-repeat: initial initial;"><b><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:
18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#7B0C00;mso-font-kerning:0pt">1. </span></b><b><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Lantinghei SC Extralight",sans-serif;
mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Lantinghei SC Extralight";
mso-bidi-font-family:"Lantinghei SC Extralight";color:#7B0C00;mso-font-kerning:
0pt">虚拟内存</span></b><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
color:#3E3E3E;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="background-color: white; background-position: initial initial; background-repeat: initial initial;"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#3E3E3E;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><o:p> </o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="background-color: white; background-position: initial initial; background-repeat: initial initial;"><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;
mso-hansi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
color:#3E3E3E;mso-font-kerning:0pt">首先需要知道的是程序运行起来的话需要被加载的物理内存中，具体到计算机硬件就是内存条。操作系统启动的时候先把自己加载到物理内存的固定位置（一般为底部），物理内存的其他位置就用来运行用户程序。程序就是一堆指令，程序运行可以简单抽象为把指令加载到内存中，然后</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#3E3E3E;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> CPU
</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#3E3E3E;
mso-font-kerning:0pt">将指令从内存载入执行。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;
font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
color:#3E3E3E;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="background-color: white; background-position: initial initial; background-repeat: initial initial;"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#3E3E3E;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><o:p> </o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="background-color: white; background-position: initial initial; background-repeat: initial initial;"><b><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:
18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#3E3E3E;mso-font-kerning:0pt">1. </span></b><b><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Lantinghei SC Extralight",sans-serif;
mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Lantinghei SC Extralight";
mso-bidi-font-family:"Lantinghei SC Extralight";color:#3E3E3E;mso-font-kerning:
0pt">为什么需要虚拟内存？</span></b><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:
"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#3E3E3E;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="background-color: white; background-position: initial initial; background-repeat: initial initial;"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#3E3E3E;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><o:p> </o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="background-color: white; background-position: initial initial; background-repeat: initial initial;"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#3E3E3E;mso-font-kerning:0pt">CPU </span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#3E3E3E;
mso-font-kerning:0pt">对内存的寻址最简单的方式就是直接使用物理内存地址，这种方式一般叫做物理寻址。早期的</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#3E3E3E;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> PC </span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#3E3E3E;
mso-font-kerning:0pt">使用物理寻址，而且像数字信号处理器、嵌入式微控制器也使用物理寻址。物理寻址的好处是简单，坏处也有很多，比如：</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#3E3E3E;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="background-color: white; background-position: initial initial; background-repeat: initial initial;"><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;
mso-hansi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
color:#3E3E3E;mso-font-kerning:0pt">不安全：操作系统的地址直接暴露给用户程序，用户程序可以破坏操作系统。这种解决方案是采用特殊的硬件保护。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#3E3E3E;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="background-color: white; background-position: initial initial; background-repeat: initial initial;"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#3E3E3E;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><o:p> </o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="background-color: white; background-position: initial initial; background-repeat: initial initial;"><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;
mso-hansi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
color:#3E3E3E;mso-font-kerning:0pt">同时运行多个程序比较困难：多个用户程序如果都直接引用物理地址，很容易互相干扰。那么是不是可以通过不断交换物理内存和磁盘来保证物理内存某一时间自由一个程序在运行呢？当时是可以的，但是这引入很多不必要和复杂的工作。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#3E3E3E;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="background-color: white; background-position: initial initial; background-repeat: initial initial;"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#3E3E3E;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><o:p> </o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="background-color: white; background-position: initial initial; background-repeat: initial initial;"><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;
mso-hansi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
color:#3E3E3E;mso-font-kerning:0pt">用户程序大小受限：受制于物理内存大小。我们现在的错觉是应用程序大小都小于物理内存，这主要是因为现在</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#3E3E3E;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> PC </span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#3E3E3E;
mso-font-kerning:0pt">的物理内存都比较大。实际上只有</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:
18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
color:#3E3E3E;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> 1G </span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;
font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";mso-fareast-font-family:
宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#3E3E3E;mso-font-kerning:0pt">物理内存的</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#3E3E3E;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> PC </span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#3E3E3E;
mso-font-kerning:0pt">是可以运行</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;
font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
color:#3E3E3E;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> 2G </span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;
font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";mso-fareast-font-family:
宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#3E3E3E;mso-font-kerning:0pt">的应用程序的。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#3E3E3E;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="background-color: white; background-position: initial initial; background-repeat: initial initial;"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#3E3E3E;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><o:p> </o:p></span></p>

mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#3E3E3E;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="background-color: white; background-position: initial initial; background-repeat: initial initial;"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#3E3E3E;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><o:p> </o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="background-color: white; background-position: initial initial; background-repeat: initial initial;"><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;
mso-hansi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
color:#3E3E3E;mso-font-kerning:0pt">综合上面各种缺点，虚拟内存出现了。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:#3E3E3E;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="background-color: white; background-position: initial initial; background-repeat: initial initial;"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;
font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#3E3E3E;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><o:p> </o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="background-color: white; background-position: initial initial; background-repeat: initial initial;"><b><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:
18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#3E3E3E;mso-font-kerning:0pt">2. </span></b><b><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Lantinghei SC Extralight",sans-serif;
mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Lantinghei SC Extralight";
mso-bidi-font-family:"Lantinghei SC Extralight";color:#3E3E3E;mso-font-kerning:
0pt">虚拟内存概览</span></b><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:
"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#3E3E3E;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="background-color: white; background-position: initial initial; background-repeat: initial initial;"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#3E3E3E;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><o:p> </o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="background-color: white; background-position: initial initial; background-repeat: initial initial;"><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;
mso-hansi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
color:#3E3E3E;mso-font-kerning:0pt">虚拟内存的基本思想是：每个程序拥有独立的地址空间（也就是虚拟内存地址，或者称作虚拟地址），互不干扰。地址空间被分割成多个块，每一块称作一页（</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#3E3E3E;mso-font-kerning:0pt">page</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#3E3E3E;
mso-font-kerning:0pt">），每一页有连续的地址范围。虚拟地址的页被映射到物理内存（通过</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:#3E3E3E;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> MMU</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#3E3E3E;
mso-font-kerning:0pt">，</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;
font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
color:#3E3E3E;mso-font-kerning:0pt">Memory Management Unit</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#3E3E3E;
mso-font-kerning:0pt">），但是并不是所有的页都必须在内存中才能运行程序。当程序引用到一部分在物理内存中的地址空间时，由硬件立刻执行必要的映射。当程序引用到一部分不在物理内存中的地址空间时，由操作系统负责将确实的部分装入物理内存。虚拟地址寻址（也叫做虚拟寻址）的示意图如下。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#3E3E3E;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="background-color: white; background-position: initial initial; background-repeat: initial initial;"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#3E3E3E;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><o:p> </o:p></span></p>

</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";

"Helvetica Neue";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#3E3E3E;
mso-font-kerning:0pt">将虚拟地址翻译成物理地址，再寻址物理内存。那么虚拟地址和物理地址具体是怎么映射的呢？完成映射还需要另一个重要的数据结构的参与：页表（</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#3E3E3E;mso-font-kerning:0pt">page
table</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;
mso-hansi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
color:#3E3E3E;mso-font-kerning:0pt">）。页表完成虚拟地址和物理地址的映射，</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:#3E3E3E;mso-font-kerning:0pt">MMU </span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#3E3E3E;
mso-font-kerning:0pt">每次翻译的时候都需要读取页表。页表的一种简单表示如下。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:#3E3E3E;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="background-color: white; background-position: initial initial; background-repeat: initial initial;"><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;
mso-hansi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
color:#3E3E3E;mso-font-kerning:0pt">这里页大小为</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:#3E3E3E;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> p </span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#3E3E3E;
mso-font-kerning:0pt">位。虚拟内存的页和物理内存的页大小一样。虚拟地址的高</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:#3E3E3E;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> n-p </span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#3E3E3E;
mso-font-kerning:0pt">位，又叫做虚拟页号（</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;
font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
color:#3E3E3E;mso-font-kerning:0pt">Virtual Page Number, VPN</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#3E3E3E;
mso-font-kerning:0pt">），用来索引物理页号（</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;
font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
color:#3E3E3E;mso-font-kerning:0pt">Physical Page Number</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#3E3E3E;
mso-font-kerning:0pt">，</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;
font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
color:#3E3E3E;mso-font-kerning:0pt">PPN</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;
font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";mso-fareast-font-family:
宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#3E3E3E;mso-font-kerning:0pt">），最后将</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#3E3E3E;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> PPN
</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#3E3E3E;
mso-font-kerning:0pt">和低</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;
font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
color:#3E3E3E;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> p </span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;
font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";mso-fareast-font-family:
宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#3E3E3E;mso-font-kerning:0pt">位组合在一起就得到了物理地址。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#3E3E3E;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="background-color: white; background-position: initial initial; background-repeat: initial initial;"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#3E3E3E;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><o:p> </o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="background-color: white; background-position: initial initial; background-repeat: initial initial;"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;
font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#3E3E3E;mso-font-kerning:0pt">3. </span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Wawati SC Regular";mso-fareast-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-bidi-font-family:"Wawati SC Regular";color:#3E3E3E;
mso-font-kerning:0pt">页表的两个问</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;
font-family:"Lantinghei SC Extralight",sans-serif;mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Lantinghei SC Extralight";mso-bidi-font-family:"Lantinghei SC Extralight";
color:#3E3E3E;mso-font-kerning:0pt">题</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:
18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#3E3E3E;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="background-color: white; background-position: initial initial; background-repeat: initial initial;"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#3E3E3E;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><o:p> </o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="background-color: white; background-position: initial initial; background-repeat: initial initial;"><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;
mso-hansi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
color:#3E3E3E;mso-font-kerning:0pt">前面说到用</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:#3E3E3E;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> VPN </span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#3E3E3E;
mso-font-kerning:0pt">来做页表索引，也就是说页表的大小为虚拟地址位数</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:#3E3E3E;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> / </span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#3E3E3E;
mso-font-kerning:0pt">页的大小。比如</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;
font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
color:#3E3E3E;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> 32 </span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;
font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";mso-fareast-font-family:
宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#3E3E3E;mso-font-kerning:0pt">位机器，页大小一般为</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#3E3E3E;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> 4K </span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#3E3E3E;
mso-font-kerning:0pt">，则页表项有</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;
font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
color:#3E3E3E;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> 2^32 / 2^12 = 2^20 </span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#3E3E3E;
mso-font-kerning:0pt">条目。如果机器字长</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;
font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
color:#3E3E3E;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> 64 </span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;
font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";mso-fareast-font-family:
宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#3E3E3E;mso-font-kerning:0pt">位，页表项就更多了。那么怎么解决呢？一般有两种方法：</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#3E3E3E;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="background-color: white; background-position: initial initial; background-repeat: initial initial;"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#3E3E3E;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><o:p> </o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="margin-left: 0cm; text-indent: -18pt; background-color: white; background-position: initial initial; background-repeat: initial initial;"><!--[if !supportLists]--><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;mso-fareast-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";mso-bidi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";color:#2E2E2E;
mso-font-kerning:0pt">1.<span style="font-size: 7pt; line-height: normal; font-family: 'Times New Roman';"> 
</span></span><!--[endif]--><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;
mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:
minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
color:#2E2E2E;mso-font-kerning:0pt">倒排页表。物理页号做索引，映射到多个虚拟地址。通过虚拟地址查找的时候就需要通过虚拟地址的中间几位来做索引了。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#2E2E2E;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="margin-left: 0cm; text-indent: -18pt; background-color: white; background-position: initial initial; background-repeat: initial initial;"><!--[if !supportLists]--><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;mso-fareast-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";mso-bidi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";color:#2E2E2E;
mso-font-kerning:0pt">2.<span style="font-size: 7pt; line-height: normal; font-family: 'Times New Roman';"> 
</span></span><!--[endif]--><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;
mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:
minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
color:#2E2E2E;mso-font-kerning:0pt">多级页表。以两级页表为例。一级页表中的每个</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#2E2E2E;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> PTE
</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#2E2E2E;
mso-font-kerning:0pt">（</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;
font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
color:#2E2E2E;mso-font-kerning:0pt">page table entry</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#2E2E2E;
mso-font-kerning:0pt">）映射虚拟地址空间的一个</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:
18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
color:#2E2E2E;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> 4MB </span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;
font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";mso-fareast-font-family:
宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#2E2E2E;mso-font-kerning:0pt">的片，每一片由</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#2E2E2E;mso-font-kerning:0pt">1024
</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#2E2E2E;
mso-font-kerning:0pt">个连续的页面组成。一级</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;
font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
color:#2E2E2E;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> PTE </span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;
font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";mso-fareast-font-family:
宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#2E2E2E;mso-font-kerning:0pt">指向二级页表的基址。这样</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#2E2E2E;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> 32 </span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#2E2E2E;
mso-font-kerning:0pt">位地址空间使用</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;
font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
color:#2E2E2E;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> 1024 </span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;
font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";mso-fareast-font-family:
宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#2E2E2E;mso-font-kerning:0pt">个一级</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#2E2E2E;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> PTE
</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#2E2E2E;
mso-font-kerning:0pt">就可以表示。需要的二级页表总条目还是</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:#2E2E2E;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> 2^32 / 2^12 = 2^20 </span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#2E2E2E;
mso-font-kerning:0pt">个。这里的关键在于如果一级</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:
18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
color:#2E2E2E;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> PTE i </span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;
font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";mso-fareast-font-family:
宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#2E2E2E;mso-font-kerning:0pt">中的页面都未被分配，一级</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#2E2E2E;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> PTE
</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#2E2E2E;
mso-font-kerning:0pt">就为空。多级页面的一个简单示意图如下。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:#2E2E2E;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="background-color: white; background-position: initial initial; background-repeat: initial initial;"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#3E3E3E;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><o:p> </o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="background-color: white; background-position: initial initial; background-repeat: initial initial;"><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;
mso-hansi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
color:#3E3E3E;mso-font-kerning:0pt">多级页表减少内存占用的关键在于：</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:#3E3E3E;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="background-color: white; background-position: initial initial; background-repeat: initial initial;"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#3E3E3E;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><o:p> </o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="margin-left: 0cm; text-indent: -18pt; background-color: white; background-position: initial initial; background-repeat: initial initial;"><!--[if !supportLists]--><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;mso-fareast-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";mso-bidi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";color:#2E2E2E;
mso-font-kerning:0pt">1.<span style="font-size: 7pt; line-height: normal; font-family: 'Times New Roman';"> 
</span></span><!--[endif]--><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;
mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:
minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
color:#2E2E2E;mso-font-kerning:0pt">如果一级页表中的一个</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:#2E2E2E;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> PTE </span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#2E2E2E;
mso-font-kerning:0pt">为空，那么相应的二级页表就根本不会存在。这是一种巨大的潜在节约。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:#2E2E2E;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="margin-left: 0cm; text-indent: -18pt; background-color: white; background-position: initial initial; background-repeat: initial initial;"><!--[if !supportLists]--><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;mso-fareast-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";mso-bidi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";color:#2E2E2E;
mso-font-kerning:0pt">2.<span style="font-size: 7pt; line-height: normal; font-family: 'Times New Roman';"> 
</span></span><!--[endif]--><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;
mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:
minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
color:#2E2E2E;mso-font-kerning:0pt">只有一级页表才需要常驻内存。虚拟内存系统可以在需要时创建、页面调入或者调出二级页表，从而减轻内存的压力。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#2E2E2E;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="background-color: white; background-position: initial initial; background-repeat: initial initial;"><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;
mso-hansi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
color:#3E3E3E;mso-font-kerning:0pt">第二个问题是页表是在内存中，而</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:#3E3E3E;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> MMU </span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#3E3E3E;
mso-font-kerning:0pt">位于</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;
font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
color:#3E3E3E;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> CPU </span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;
font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";mso-fareast-font-family:
宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#3E3E3E;mso-font-kerning:0pt">芯片中，这样每次地址翻译可能都需要先访问一次内存中的页表（</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#3E3E3E;mso-font-kerning:0pt">CPU
L1,L2,L3 Cache Miss </span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;
mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:
minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
color:#3E3E3E;mso-font-kerning:0pt">的时候访问内存），效率非常低下。对应的解决方案是引入页表的高速缓存：</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#3E3E3E;mso-font-kerning:0pt">TLB</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#3E3E3E;
mso-font-kerning:0pt">（</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;
font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
color:#3E3E3E;mso-font-kerning:0pt">Translation Lookaside Buffer</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#3E3E3E;
mso-font-kerning:0pt">）。加入</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;
font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
color:#3E3E3E;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> TLB</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;
font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";mso-fareast-font-family:
宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#3E3E3E;mso-font-kerning:0pt">，整个虚拟地址翻译的过程如下两图所示。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#3E3E3E;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="background-color: white; background-position: initial initial; background-repeat: initial initial;"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#3E3E3E;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><o:p> </o:p></span></p>

mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#3E3E3E;mso-font-kerning:0pt">TLB </span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#3E3E3E;
mso-font-kerning:0pt">等，分页内存管理方法已经相当不错了。那么分页有什么缺点呢？</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:#3E3E3E;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="background-color: white; background-position: initial initial; background-repeat: initial initial;"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#3E3E3E;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><o:p> </o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="margin-left: 0cm; text-indent: -18pt; background-color: white; background-position: initial initial; background-repeat: initial initial;"><!--[if !supportLists]--><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;mso-fareast-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";mso-bidi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";color:#2E2E2E;
mso-font-kerning:0pt">1.<span style="font-size: 7pt; line-height: normal; font-family: 'Times New Roman';"> 
</span></span><!--[endif]--><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;
mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:
minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
color:#2E2E2E;mso-font-kerning:0pt">共享困难：通过共享页面来实现共享当然是可以的。这里的问题在于我们要保证页面上只包含可以共享的内容并不是一件容易的事儿，因为进程空间是直接映射到页面上的。这样一个页面上很可能包含不能共享的内容（比如既包含代码又包含数据，代码可以共享，而数据不能共享）。早期的</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#2E2E2E;mso-font-kerning:0pt">
PDP-11 </span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;
mso-hansi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
color:#2E2E2E;mso-font-kerning:0pt">实现的一种解决方法是为指令和数据设置分离的地址空间，分别称为</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#2E2E2E;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> I </span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#2E2E2E;
mso-font-kerning:0pt">空间和</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;
font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
color:#2E2E2E;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> D </span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;
font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";mso-fareast-font-family:
宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#2E2E2E;mso-font-kerning:0pt">空间（其实这已经和分段很像了）。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#2E2E2E;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="margin-left: 0cm; text-indent: -18pt; background-color: white; background-position: initial initial; background-repeat: initial initial;"><!--[if !supportLists]--><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;mso-fareast-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";mso-bidi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";color:#2E2E2E;
mso-font-kerning:0pt">2.<span style="font-size: 7pt; line-height: normal; font-family: 'Times New Roman';"> 
</span></span><!--[endif]--><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;
mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:
minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
color:#2E2E2E;mso-font-kerning:0pt">程序地址空间受限于虚拟地址：我们将程序全部映射到一个统一的虚拟地址的问题在于不好扩张。不如我们程序的地址按先代码放在一起，然后把数据放在一起，然后再放</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#2E2E2E;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> XXX</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#2E2E2E;
mso-font-kerning:0pt">，这样其中某一部分的空间扩张起来都会影响到相邻的空间，非常不方便。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:#2E2E2E;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="background-color: white; background-position: initial initial; background-repeat: initial initial;"><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;
mso-hansi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
color:#3E3E3E;mso-font-kerning:0pt">上面的问题一个比较直观的解决方法是提供多个独立的地址空间，也就是段（</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#3E3E3E;mso-font-kerning:0pt">segment</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#3E3E3E;
mso-font-kerning:0pt">）。每个段的长度视具体的段不同而不同，而且是可以在运行期动态改变的。因为每个段都构成了一个独立的地址空间，所以它们可以独立的增长或者减小而不会影响到其他的段。如果一个段比较大，把它整个保存到内存中可能很不方便甚至是不可能的，因此可以对段采用分页管理，只有那些真正需要的页面才会被调入内存。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#3E3E3E;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="background-color: white; background-position: initial initial; background-repeat: initial initial;"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#3E3E3E;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><o:p> </o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="background-color: white; background-position: initial initial; background-repeat: initial initial;"><!--[if mso & !supportInlineShapes & supportFields]><span

    <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><span lang=EN-US

</v:shape><span style='mso-element:field-end'></span></span><![endif]--><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#3E3E3E;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="background-color: white; background-position: initial initial; background-repeat: initial initial;"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#3E3E3E;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><o:p> </o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="background-color: white; background-position: initial initial; background-repeat: initial initial;"><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;
mso-hansi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
color:#3E3E3E;mso-font-kerning:0pt">采用分段和分页结合的方式管理内存，一个地址由两个部分组成：段和段内地址。段内地址又进一步分为页号和页偏移。在进行内存访问时，过程如下：</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#3E3E3E;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="background-color: white; background-position: initial initial; background-repeat: initial initial;"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#3E3E3E;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><o:p> </o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="margin-left: 0cm; text-indent: -18pt; background-color: white; background-position: initial initial; background-repeat: initial initial;"><!--[if !supportLists]--><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;mso-fareast-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";mso-bidi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";color:#2E2E2E;
mso-font-kerning:0pt">1.<span style="font-size: 7pt; line-height: normal; font-family: 'Times New Roman';"> 
</span></span><!--[endif]--><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;
mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:
minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
color:#2E2E2E;mso-font-kerning:0pt">根据段号找到段描述符（存放段基址）。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:#2E2E2E;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="margin-left: 0cm; text-indent: -18pt; background-color: white; background-position: initial initial; background-repeat: initial initial;"><!--[if !supportLists]--><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;mso-fareast-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";mso-bidi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";color:#2E2E2E;
mso-font-kerning:0pt">2.<span style="font-size: 7pt; line-height: normal; font-family: 'Times New Roman';"> 
</span></span><!--[endif]--><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;
mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:
minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
color:#2E2E2E;mso-font-kerning:0pt">检查该段的页表是否在内存中。如果在，则找到它的位置，如果不在，则产生段错误。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#2E2E2E;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="margin-left: 0cm; text-indent: -18pt; background-color: white; background-position: initial initial; background-repeat: initial initial;"><!--[if !supportLists]--><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;mso-fareast-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";mso-bidi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";color:#2E2E2E;
mso-font-kerning:0pt">3.<span style="font-size: 7pt; line-height: normal; font-family: 'Times New Roman';"> 
</span></span><!--[endif]--><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;
mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:
minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
color:#2E2E2E;mso-font-kerning:0pt">检查所请求的虚拟页面的页表项，如果该页面不在内存中则产生缺页中断，如果在内存中就从页表项中取出这个页面在内存中的起始地址。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#2E2E2E;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="margin-left: 0cm; text-indent: -18pt; background-color: white; background-position: initial initial; background-repeat: initial initial;"><!--[if !supportLists]--><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;mso-fareast-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";mso-bidi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";color:#2E2E2E;
mso-font-kerning:0pt">4.<span style="font-size: 7pt; line-height: normal; font-family: 'Times New Roman';"> 
</span></span><!--[endif]--><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;
mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:
minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
color:#2E2E2E;mso-font-kerning:0pt">将页面起始地址和偏移量进行拼接得到物理地址，然后完成读写。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#2E2E2E;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="background-color: white; background-position: initial initial; background-repeat: initial initial;"><b><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:
18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#3E3E3E;mso-font-kerning:0pt">2. </span></b><b><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Wawati SC Regular";mso-fareast-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-bidi-font-family:"Wawati SC Regular";color:#3E3E3E;
mso-font-kerning:0pt">进程的</span></b><b><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;
font-family:"Lantinghei SC Extralight",sans-serif;mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Lantinghei SC Extralight";mso-bidi-font-family:"Lantinghei SC Extralight";
color:#3E3E3E;mso-font-kerning:0pt">段</span></b><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;mso-fareast-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#3E3E3E;
mso-font-kerning:0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="background-color: white; background-position: initial initial; background-repeat: initial initial;"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#3E3E3E;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><o:p> </o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="background-color: white; background-position: initial initial; background-repeat: initial initial;"><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;
mso-hansi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
color:#3E3E3E;mso-font-kerning:0pt">每个</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:
18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
color:#3E3E3E;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> Linux </span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;
font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";mso-fareast-font-family:
宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#3E3E3E;mso-font-kerning:0pt">程序都有一个运行时内存映像，也就是各个段的布局，简单如下图所示。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#3E3E3E;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>
